item.title: Deploying Azure Stack HCI OS using Canonical MAAS
item.description: There are a handful of ways to deploy an Azure Stack HCI OS Image. Solutions like System Center Configuration Manager (SCCM/ConfigMgr), Microsoft Deployment Toolkit (MDT), Windows Deployment Services (WDS), and other IaC solutions like Terraform and Ansible with the proper configurations that is. We also have a solution from Canonical called MAAS or Metal-As-A-Service. In my career I have always leaned toward Microsoft solutions to deploy Microsoft Operating Systems, so I would say I am a little biased and would prefer to use tools like MDT along with WDS.
